ch.leica.sdk.Reconnection

Class ReconnectionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.leica.sdk.Reconnection.ReconnectionHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Device.ConnectionListener, DeviceManager.FoundAvailableDeviceListener, ErrorListener

    public class ReconnectionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceManager.FoundAvailableDeviceListener, ErrorListener, Device.ConnectionListener
    This class helps to autoreconnect to a device.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • startReconnecting

        public void startReconnecting()
        Triggers the reconnection process in the background. Will continue until a device is reconnected successfully or if stopReconnecting() is called.

      • setDeviceManager

        public void setDeviceManager()

      • stopReconnecting

        public void stopReconnecting()
        Stops the reconnection process

      • onConnectionStateChanged

        public void onConnectionStateChanged(Device device,
                                     Device.ConnectionState state)
        Listen for changes in the connection of a device
        Specified by:
        onConnectionStateChanged in interface Device.ConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        device - the device on which the connection state changed
        state - the current connection state. If state is disconnected, the device object is not valid anymore. No connection can be established with this object any more.
